titleStmt.title: A sermon preached upon the much lamented death of our late gracious sovereign Queen Mary to which is added The address of condolence to His Majesty by the dissenting ministers / by William Bates ...
titleStmt.author: Bates, William, 1625-1699.

notesStmt.note: Half-title: Dr. Bates's sermon upon the death of the Queen.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
